.pro files

body_radius.pro

Returns the sizes of the given bodies.

body_to_image_pos.pro

Transforms vectors in body coordinates to image coordinates

body_to_surface.pro

Transforms points in body coordinates to surface coordinates.

disk_to_image.pro

Transforms points in disk coordinates to image coordinates

disk_to_inertial_pos.pro

Transforms position vectors in disk coordinates to inertial coordinates.

disk_to_map.pro

Transforms points in disk coordinates to map coordinates.

get_surface_ranges.pro

Determines full ranges of valid surface coordinate system.

globe_to_image.pro

Transforms points in body globe coordinates to image coordinates.

globe_to_map.pro

Transforms points in globe coordinates to map coordinates.

hide_points.pro

Hides points with respect to given object and observer.

image_origin.pro

Returns the origin of a map or camera image.

image_size.pro

Returns the size of a map or camera image.

image_to_body.pro

Transforms points in image coordinates to body coordinates on the object.

image_to_disk.pro

Transforms points in image coordinates to disk coordinates

image_to_globe.pro

Transforms points in image coordinates to body globe coordinates

image_to_inertial.pro

Transforms points in image coordinates to unit vectors with inertial coordinates.

image_to_map.pro

Transforms points in image coordinates to map coordinates.

image_to_orbit.pro

Computes orbital elements corresponding to image points, assuming a circular orbit.

image_to_radec.pro

Transforms points in image coordinates to polar ra/dec coords w.r.t the inertial frame.

image_to_surface.pro

Transforms points in image coordinates to surface coordinates.

inertial_to_disk.pro

Transforms vectors in inertial coordinates to disk coordinates.

inertial_to_disk_pos.pro

Transforms position vectors in inertial coordinates to disk coordinates.

inertial_to_globe.pro

Transforms vectors in inertial coordinates to globe coordinates.

inertial_to_globe_pos.pro

Transforms position vectors in inertial coordinates to globe coordinates.

inertial_to_image.pro

Transforms vectors in inertial coordinates to image coordinates

inertial_to_image_pos.pro

Transforms vectors in inertial coordinates to image coordinates

map_to_disk.pro

Transforms points in map coordinates to disk coordinates.

map_to_globe.pro

Transforms points in map coordinates to surface coordinates.

map_to_image.pro

Transforms points from map coordinates to image coordinates.

map_to_surface.pro

Transforms points in map coordinates to surface coordinates.

point_cloud.pro

Returns the sizes of the given bodies.

radec_to_image.pro

Transforms points in polar ra/dec coords w.r.t the inertial frame to image coords.

set_image_origin.pro

Sets the origin of a map or camera image.

set_image_size.pro

Sets the size of a map or camera image.

surface_hide_points.pro

Hides points with respect to surface objects.

surface_image_bounds.pro

Computes latitude / longitude ranges visible in an image.

surface_intersect.pro

Computes the intersection of rays with surface objects.

surface_normal.pro

Computes the normal at points on a surface.

surface_to_body.pro

Transforms points in any surface coordinate system to body coordinates.

surface_to_image.pro

Transforms points in any surface coordinate system to image coordinates.

surface_to_map.pro

Transforms points in any surface coordinate system to map coordinates.

ta_to_az.pro

Computes azimuths relative to a given observer descriptor.
